<|endoftext|>Ideas for using a shell company to hide your assets and avoid taxes?
Yes, there are ways to hide your assets. One is to use assets in shell companies to try to get them out of your taxable estate.
However, the IRS knows how shell companies work. They can find out if your assets are being moved around or "tunneled" through these entities.
Use of shell companies to hide assets is a violation of the Internal Revenue Code.
Using shell companies to avoid taxes is a violation of the Internal Revenue Code.<|endoftext|>
